thread.title: A classy retreat just outside Stellenbosch town
thread.title_full: A classy retreat just outside Stellenbosch town - Review of Lanzerac Hotel & Spa, Stellenbosch, South Africa - TripAdvisor

author: Maskop74
title: A classy retreat just outside Stellenbosch town
text: Peace and comfort, great service and a lot of friendliness. Perfect location, just outside town and a few minutes form other wineries too. We really enjoyed Lanzerac and would return on a next trip :)
